entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
